net.myorb.charting

Interface DisplayGraphLibraryInterface


  • public interface DisplayGraphLibraryInterface
    graphics library interface
    Author:
    Michael Druckman

    • Method Detail

      • traditionalChart

        void traditionalChart(java.lang.String styleName,
                      DisplayGraphLibraryInterface.Portions portions)
        produce a portioned chart
        Parameters:
        styleName - the style of the chart
        portions - the portions to be displayed

      • regressionPlot

        void regressionPlot(DisplayGraphTypes.Point.Series dataPoints,
                    DisplayGraphTypes.Point.Series funcPlot,
                    java.lang.String title)
        produce an interpolation function graph against data points
        Parameters:
        dataPoints - the set of raw plot points from original data
        funcPlot - the set of plot points for the interpolation function
        title - a text title for use by the display frame

      • barChart

        void barChart(DisplayGraphTypes.Point.Series funcPlot,
              java.lang.String title)
        simple bar chart
        Parameters:
        funcPlot - the set of plot points
        title - a text title for use by the display frame

      • singlePlotWithAxis

        void singlePlotWithAxis(java.awt.Color color,
                        DisplayGraphTypes.PlotCollection funcPlot,
                        java.lang.String functionName,
                        java.lang.String parameter,
                        DisplayGraphTypes.RealFunction f)
        simple single function plot
        Parameters:
        color - the color to use for the plot
        funcPlot - the set of plot points for the function
        functionName - the name of the user defined function
        parameter - name of the parameter from the declaration
        f - access to the function

      • multiPlotWithAxis

        void multiPlotWithAxis(DisplayGraphTypes.Colors colors,
                       DisplayGraphTypes.PlotCollection funcPlot,
                       java.lang.String title,
                       java.lang.String expression,
                       DisplayGraphTypes.RealFunction f)
        display multiple plots on same set of axis
        Parameters:
        colors - the color to use for each plot
        funcPlot - the set of plot points for each function
        title - a text title for the display frame
        expression - description of plot request
        f - access to the function
